ygData.subject: RE: FRune of One Eye (Bottom Portion)
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe the upcoming bardic weapon? Just guessing. Sylly ... From:	Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@insnet.com] Sent:	Saturday, October 23, 1999 3:52 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe the upcoming bardic weapon?

Just guessing.

Sylly

From: Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]

Subject: Re: [eqbards] FRune of One Eye (Bottom
Portion)

From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>

I guess I need to be more specific.. Every listing I've
seen (an email
posted here an a couple of websites) that lists the details
of the quests
talk about the top and middle. The bottom by the way is
from Droon, (not
Froon or Choon). So I'm looking for exact details what the
bottom part is
used for.

Thanks

Slyde

anywhere?
